channel.title: Social Media on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Social Media on PepsFeeder

item.title: Deepfake of U.S. Official Appears After Shift on Ukraine Attacks in Russia
item.description: Probe A deepfake video of a U.S. official appeared online after the Justice Department said it would no longer prosecute two Ukrainian officials accused of tampering with the 2016 election.

item.title: A Small Army Combating a Flood of Deepfakes in India’s Election
item.description: The Indian government has deployed a small army of fact-checkers to combat a flood of deepfakes during the country’s general election, which began on Thursday.

item.title: TikTok, the new kid on the block
item.description: We’re creeping into the world of TikTok, the app that is everyone’s guilty pleasure. It’s getting a bad rep because of all the 12-year-olds, but man once you’re on it you’re on it, and you’re not getting off.

item.title: Social media celebrities become millionaires this his how they changed marketing landscape
item.description: To reach a wide audience, brands are devoting an increasing share of their advertising budgets to social networking sites led by young icons that help shape a new sales culture.
